channel.title: News on Agnès Pérez-Millan
channel.description: Recent content in News on Agnès Pérez-Millan

item.title: My Science Podcast Episode 2
item.description: In the second podcast of Píndoles Científiques of La Local, we talk about Grace Hopper Here, you can listen

item.title: They explain our article
item.description: They explain the article “Sex differences in early-onset Alzheimer’s disease” at the outreach level.

item.title: My Science Podcast Episode 1
item.description: In the first podcast of Píndoles Científiques of La Local, we talk about Alan Turing and the Enigma machine Here, you can listen

item.title: Visiting Escola Misericòrdia
item.description: I have visited Escola Misericòrdia (Canet de Mar) with the project Camins Infinits. I have given an outreach talk about my PhD research.

item.title: Sopa De Partícules Project
item.description: I visited the Centre Cívic Guinardó of Barcelona to discuss how a physicist studies Alzheimer’s Disease and frontotemporal dementia with artificial intelligence in the Sopa de Partícules Talks. Here is video of the talk.

item.title: Visiting the Public Library of Tiana
item.description: I visited the Public Library of Tiana to participate in a talk about women in STEM in celebration of the International Day of Women and Girls in Science

item.title: Visiting La LOCAL Ràdio Tiana
item.description: I talked about women in STEM. Here the program.

item.title: Visiting the Public Library of Tiana
item.description: I visited the Public Library of Tiana to talk about how a physicist is studying Alzheimer’s Disease with artificial intelligence on Alzheimer’s Disease Day.

item.title: Visiting La LOCAL Ràdio Tiana
item.description: I talked about machine learning focused on neurodegenerative diseases for Alzheimer’s Day. Here the program.

item.title: Ready for my talk at ETAI 2022
item.description: I had an oral at the ETAI Conference 2022 about machine learning classification between EOAD and FTD using neuroimaging.

item.title: My outreach video is out!
item.description: In this video I explain how mathematics could help in the diagnosis of diseases.

item.title: Visiting RAC1
item.description: The first time on the radio, it was amazing! I talked about machine learning focused on neurodegenerative diseases. Here the program.

item.title: Ready for OHBM 2022
item.description: We have arrived at Glasgow with our poster for the OHBM 2022 I have presented for the first time in person my poster. Also, we have some very nice networking time :)

item.title: Brain week at Ciència Oberta
item.description: We have explained our studies about the brain.

item.title: Ready for AD/PD 2022
item.description: First poster in person for the AD/PD 2022 International Conference on Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s Diseases.

item.title: Visiting Escola Meritxell
item.description: I have visited Escola Meritxell (Mataró) with the project Camins Infinits. I have given an outreach talk about my PhD research.

item.title: Visiting the Institut Sunsi Móra
item.description: I have visited Institut Sunsi Móra (Canet de Mar) with the project #100tífiques for the International Day of Women and Girls in Science. I have given an outreach talk about my PhD research.

item.title: Visiting Escola Cor de Maria de Sant Celoni
item.description: I have visited Escola Cor de Maria de Sant Celoni with the project Camins Infinits. I have given an outreach talk about my PhD research.
